## Self-review checklist

### File & naming
- [ ] File is in `terms/`, named in `kebab-case.md`
- [ ] Filename matches the term name (e.g. `affinity-diagramming.md`)

### Frontmatter
- [ ] `category` is one of: `ux`, `ui`, `design-systems`, `motion`, `accessibility`, `product`, `research`, `strategy`
- [ ] `type` is one of: `concept`, `methodology`, `principle`, `pattern`, `framework`, `tool`
- [ ] `tags` is a YAML list (e.g. `[research, testing]`)

### Content
- [ ] Heading matches the term name exactly
- [ ] `## Definition` section is present and clear
- [ ] `## Examples` section has at least one example
- [ ] `## Do's and Don'ts` section is present with at least one item each
- [ ] `## References` section includes at least one link

### Quality
- [ ] Definition is in plain English, jargon-free where possible
- [ ] No duplicate of an existing term in `terms/`
- [ ] Follows the structure in `TEMPLATE.md`
